DOC.brief_summary: Previous study suggest self-regulatory technique include self-monitoring , SMS text-messaging intervention modality , modify health behavior include physical activity ( PA ) . The primary purpose study examine change objectively measure PA randomize control pilot trial test wearable sensor/device ( Fitbit One ) self-monitoring SMS text-messaging prompt promote PA overweight/obese adult . In 2-group design , 67 participant provide Fitbit One half randomize receive 3 daily SMS-based PA prompt . A Fitbit One provide facilitate self-monitoring wearable tracker instant feedback website daily PA summary . Outcome measure number step minute PA intensity-level use two accelerometer : Actigraph GT3X+ ( primary ) baseline 6-week follow-up Fitbit One ( secondary ) baseline week 1-6 . The main hypothesis text message plus Fitbit One would show great increase step minute PA compare Fitbit One 6-week follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Fitbit One Text Messaging Prompts Promote Physical Activity Overweight/Obese Adults
DOC.criteria: 1869 year age overweight obese ( otherwise healthy ) meet recommended level PA ( > 150 min/wk MVPA ) own personal mobile phone able use SMS textmessaging own personal computer , access Internet , able operate Fitbit One fluent English
